description:
This must now be the best value home in Yarram. Brick Veneer on slab foundation with tiled roof. Solidly built family style home.

Walk in and enjoy the peaceful surroundings amongst the quiet and beautiful surroundings in the heart of Yarram and the South Gippsland area.

This beautifully presented home is in a very pleasant location. Wake up for breakfast facing the tranquil grazing paddocks immediately across the road. Never will this view be built out and it creates a feeling of country style living with the added benefit of the supermarket 400 metres away. Best of both worlds.

Not only is this home well proportioned, this one has been built to last. On 722 m2 of land, the home faces north and the large windows in the living areas take advantage of the expansive farmland across the road. This property presents the perfect opportunity for a first home buyer, downsizer, or a holiday home.

These homes are in demand and this beauty offers semi-open living/dining areas, wood heating and ceiling fan. You will also appreciate the natural light that is generated into this home through large north facing windows.

This well-designed brick veneer home has 3 comfortable-sized bedrooms, two with BIR's. All bedrooms are positioned off the hallway allowing private zoned living. The bathroom features a separate bath and shower. Separate W/C. The home encompasses a large galley style kitchen area with ample bench space, perfect for preparing and cooking on, dishwasher, electric cooktop, and pantry.

Large laundry with rear access to a backyard big enough for kids and pets. There is a garden shed and undercover wood shed with endless opportunity to be creative with the space. Carport and rear yard access available for larger vehicles and a low maintenance garden to complete the picture.

Lovely neighbourhood and walking distance to schools and shopping makes this one even more appealing. Certainly an ideal location.

To seize the opportunity to live or invest in the desirable location contact Chloe Lindsay on 0497 178 007 now for any information or to book an inspection and put your best foot forward with an offer!

For a Due Diligence Checklist go to: consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
